label: ball
caption: A playful black dog, wearing a bright orange bandanna around its neck, has caught sight of its beloved blue soccer ball rolling through the crunchy fallen leaves on the forest floor. With a burst of energy, the dog pounces, its paws barely missing the ball as it bounces and rolls further into the leaf-covered clearing. The sun casts dappled shadows across the scene, illuminating the vibrant colors of the bandanna and the ball as they dance through the autumnal leaves.
